title: Search results not selected in external jar
description: When searching for references to a field in an external JAR, the search results are not being properly selected in Build 200201151. I have performed a search for references to a specific field and noticed that the first match is not being highlighted as selected when double-clicked on.
OB: When double-clicking on a search result, the first match is not being selected.
EB: When double-clicking on a search result, the corresponding match should be selected and highlighted.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Make sure you have JDK1.3.1 as the default JRE (and that you have source for rt.jar)
2. Open java.io.File
3. Select the field 'tmpFir'
4. Perform a search for references to this field
5. Double-click on the search result
